messages.title: BREXIT ELECTION. YOUR CHOICE IS CLEAR:
messages.content: CHANGE WITH THE LIB DEMS OR HARD BREXIT AND NHS CUTS

messages.title: CHANGE THE DIRECTION OF OUR COUNTRY
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems are fighting to stop hard Brexit

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight hard Brexit and protect our place in the Single Market.
Opposition to NHS and local schools facing huge cuts.
Fight for the rights of EU nationals to stay.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The local Liberal Democrats have more than doubled in size to over 1,200 since last year's referendum in response to a hard Brexit. Putney boasted the second highest Remain vote in the EU referendum, rendering it at risk of a Lib Dem surge.

issues.brexitEurope: Lib Dems will fight hard Brexit and protect our place in the Single Market. Conservatives are forcing the country towards an extreme hard Brexit. Labour are too weak and divided to oppose the Conservatives.
issues.health: Our NHS and local schools face huge cuts, piling pressure on already stretched services.
issues.immigration: Ryan will fight for the rights of EU nationals to stay.

endorsements.endorsement: Justine Greening, the education secretary, is one of the cabinet ministers most at risk on June 8. Putney boasted the second highest Remain vote in the EU referendum, rendering it at risk of a Lib Dem surge.
Lib Dems are the anti Brexit, Remain party. So for all those Remain voters still unreconciled to the outcome of the referendum, they are the obvious choice to go for.

quotes.text: "Lib Dems are the anti Brexit, Remain party. So for all those Remain voters still unreconciled to the outcome of the referendum, they are the obvious choice to go for."

"Justine Greening, the education secretary, is one of the cabinet ministers most at risk on June 8. Putney boasted the second highest Remain vote in the EU referendum, rendering it at risk of a Lib Dem surge."

images.caption: Choose a future for our country
